summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.3°C) and outside temperature (down 11.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 13%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 395 m) and light levels (up 10134 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 14465 lux), and cloud levels (up 279 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 394.5m lower than yesterday, 269.9m lower than past week, 278.8m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 425m minimum and 1526m maximum, with an average of 558.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 828.4m and 837.3m.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; cold spells are likely. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and light winds will prevail. Drizzle or light rain possible, fog or low cloud is expected, and a mix of sun and clouds. The weather will likely remain the same.
